divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside about dark . I was taking pictures of the sky . I caught four different ufo type objects in my pictures. They were bright in the sky. I came inside and put on my computer. I zoomed in on my pictures because I had seen something weird about them. I spotted V shaped objects toward NE direction following each other and another on in the southernly sky from me. They were bright in color; white. The one in the south area was V shaped, bright white but it changed shape. It was bright and after a while it took off. It frightened me and I told my husband about it. I showed him on my computer when I zoomed in on the photos I took. He said what was that. I never seen anything like these in person. You have to zoom in on picture to see the UFO Object. It was in the sky.
Summary: I was taking pictures of the sky and when I came in to put on my computer; I was looking at pictures and saw four different Ufo's in my pictures. They were triangular shapes; like V shaped with white colors. . One changed shapes.; it was white.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Morgan
There were 2 other sightings in Morgan on or around February 4th 2013
